#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(void)
{
    int t; cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        string hay,needle;
        cin>>hay>>needle;
        short len=10,i,j;
        bool flag=false;
        for(i=0;i<=5;i++)
        {
            for(j=0;j<5;j++)
            {
                if(hay[i+j]!=needle[j])
                    break;
            }
            if(j==5)
            {
                flag=1;
                break;
            }
        }
        flag?cout<<1<<endl:cout<<0<<endl;
    }
}
